Submodules

ts_semantic_feature_detector.input_utils.extrinsics module

Implements arbirary extrinsics information extraction.

ts_semantic_feature_detector.input_utils.extrinsics.get_extrinsics(ekf: List, imu: List) → Tuple[List, List, List, List][source]

Get the extrinsics information from IMU and EKF.

It also implements arbitrary body to camera transformation.

OBS: IMU is not being used for now.

Parameters:

  • ekf (list) – the EKF data. It is expected that the first three components are the X, Y and Z position coordinates and the other four components are the X, Y, Z and W orientation quaternion values.

  • imu (list) – the IMU data. It is expected that it has the X, Y, Z and W orientation quaternion values.

Returns:

  • pos_world_body (list) – the position of the body in the world frame.

  • orient_world_body (list) – the orientation of the body in the world frame.

  • pos_camera_body (list) – the position of the camera in the body frame.

  • orient_camera_body (list) – the orientation of the camera in the body frame.
